configuration:
<% if @name_node %>
fs.default.name hdfs://<%= @name_node[:fqdn] %>:9000/
dfs.hosts.exclude /var/lib/hadoop/dfs.hosts.exclude
<% end %>
topology.script.file.name /opt/hadoop/conf/topology.sh
hadoop.tmp.dir <%= node[:hadoop][:tmp_dir] %>/${user.name}
fs.s3.awsAccessKeyId <%= node[:hadoop][:fs][:s3][:access_key] %>
fs.s3.awsSecretAccessKey <%= node[:hadoop][:fs][:s3][:secret_key] %>
fs.s3n.awsAccessKeyId <%= node[:hadoop][:fs][:s3][:access_key] %>
fs.s3n.awsSecretAccessKey <%= node[:hadoop][:fs][:s3][:secret_key] %>
fs.inmemory.size.mb <%= node[:hadoop][:fs][:inmemory] %>
